physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ultrasonography showed several fetal anomalies including polyhydramnios, nuchal and general oedema, hepatomegaly, and general growth restriction.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Post-mortem examination of both fetuses showed unspecific brain anomalies with ventriculomegaly and asplenia, and the first fetus had cystic kidney dysplasia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Both fetuses showed shared facial features and general oedema, indicating a similar underlying condition.
